title: paripaalayamaam
sahitya:
paripAlaya mAm kOdaNDapANE pAvana shrta cintAmaNE

anupallavi

 sarasija bhavanuta caraNa sarOja sAkEta sadana dasharatha tanuja

caraNam 1

 shESAdhipa vara bhUSaNa vAgvishESa krta nAmaghOSa janita santOSa 
ravija sambhASaNa natajana pOSaNa shubhakara vESa nirdOSa
   
caraNam 2

 satya santa vara bhrtya pAlakAditya kulOttama satya janAvana atyanta 
sundara nrtya janapriya stutya sucaritra gaNapati hrdayAkAra pAlana 
jAgarUka sharaNAgata vatsala tyAgarAjanuta nAgAri turaga
